Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication
College_Summary: Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication, Noida is affiliated to SVU, Amroha and approved by UGC and AIU. The institute offers UG, PG, and Diploma and Certification courses in the field of Mass Communication, Journalism, Graphics Designing, Professional Photography and Videography, and Advanced level Editing (photo and video). Flagship courses of Puppets Picture College of Mass Communication are their BJMC and MJMC course. Another popular course of the institute is their PGDM course in Mass Communication. Apart from that, the college offers 16 certification courses in subjects like Filmmaking, Modeling, Graphic Design, Animation, Photography, Radio Jockey, etc. Admission to the courses offered by Puppets Picture College is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination, aptitude test, and interview. The college provides up to 50% Scholarships based on Merit.

College_Name: AND Academy
College_Summary: AND Academy is an online learning platform established by the Indian Institute of Art and Design (IIAD) Delhi. The institute offers full-time and part-time Certificate, Diploma and PG Diploma programs for graduates and working professionals in the fields of Graphic Design, User Experience (UX) Design, User Interface (UI) Design, Interior Design and Motion Graphics. Admission to AND Academy is based on performance in the interview round. It also offers demo classes to students, which can be attended after filling out the application form to understand the way of teaching in a better way. AND Academy will issue a certificate upon the completion of the course by the candidate. Some of the courses like the PG Diploma in Graphic Design, Diploma in UI UX Design and PG Diploma in UI UX Design provide a 100% job guarantee. AND Academy also offers scholarships to exceptional students.

Puran Murti Campus
College_Summary: Puran Murti Campus is a private educational institute located in Sonipat, Haryana. It has been accredited by NAAC Grade A. Puran Murti Campus is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, PCI, NCVT, and UGC. It is affiliated with DCRUST Sonepat, DTE Haryana, Pt. Bhagwat Dayal Sharma University of Health Sciences, and Maharishi Dayanand University. The campus of the institute is spread over an area of 35 acres. Puran Murti Campus offers UG, PG and Vocational Courses in the fields of Engineering, Pharmacy, Computer Application, Law, etc. The institute has reserved 30% of seats for meritorious students as per their academic performance. Admission to Puran Murti Campus B.Tech courses is based on AME CET/ IIT JEE scores whereas the institute accepts GATE scores for offering admission to M.Tech programs. It holds the institutional membership of the Indian Society of Technical Education (ISTE), Computer Society of India and National HRD Network. It is also accredited by Herzing University, USA.
